intro.title: Building Trust Since 1975
intro.description: Salsabeel Al Janoob's story began in 1975 in Oman, with a vision to connect local businesses with global markets through exceptional import and export services.

founder.title: Founder's Vision
founder.descriptionAfter: instilled a commitment to integrity and customer focus, building a foundation for long-term growth.

growth.title: Strategic Growth & Diversification
growth.description: Recognizing evolving market needs, we strategically diversified into waste management, retail consultancy, and more. This diversification leveraged our international network and market insights gained through our core trade business.

globalExpansion.title: Global Expansion
globalExpansion.description: Our recent expansion into India further strengthens our global reach, creating new opportunities for international collaboration and trade excellence.

legacy.title: Continuing the Legacy
legacy.description: Guided by our leadership team's expertise, we remain dedicated to innovation and sustainable growth, continuing to connect opportunities for clients worldwide while maintaining our core values of integrity and excellence.
